reasoning: Reporting incidence at birth. Penile hypospadias (distal/glandular) accounts for ~70% of all hypospadias cases. Global hypospadias rate ~500 per 100k male births, so penile type ~350 per 100k male births.
source: Baskin LS et al. (2018). Hypospadias and endocrine disruption: is there a connection? Environ Health Perspect. 109:1175-1183
